technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant recalls feeling concerned and scared for those being affected by COVID in the past.
communal_orientation: The participant asks the conversation partner about their experience during the pandemic.
engagement: The participant is engaged in the conversation and genuinely converses with their partner.
defensiveness: The participant is not at all defensive in justifying their beliefs/perspective.

questions.transcript: Did you experience any side effects?

vaccine_importance: The participant did not explicitly state their belief about the importance of vaccines at the end of the conversation.
booster_importance: The participant did not explicitly state their belief about the importance of boosters at the end of the conversation.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrates a moderate amount of cognitive complexity by considering different aspects of the pandemic and vaccination.
general_notes: The participant is very polite and engaged in the conversation.
